name: eWinWin
tag_list: ewinwin, group-buying-facebook-application, group-buy, group, buying-group, buying-sites, group-deal, group-deal-wizard, group-deals, group-discount, group-purchasing, group-sales, online-sales, private-label-social-buying-platform, prosumer, social-buyin
overview:
eWinWin’s patented Social Buying Platform enables a business to create group deals online and directly market them to communities of fans and social networks, without having to pay the hefty fees associated with collective group buying sites.

eWinWin’s founder and CEO, Greg Mesaros, has more patents issued than any other inventor in the social buying space. Over the past 12 years, eWinWin has invested millions of dollars into developing the most powerful and scalable Social Buying Platform in the industry.
